Event.name: Use_vehicle
Event.definition: <def-root>A <fen>Driver</fen> transports themselves and possibly other passengers (the <fen>Theme</fen>) to another location.</def-root>

Arg.name: Theme
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Theme</fen> is the entity which moves by means of the <fen>Vehicle</fen>. <ex><fex name="Theme">Margeret</fex> <t>flew</t> to Cabo San Lucas.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Vehicle
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Vehicle</fen> is the means of conveyance of the <fen>Theme</fen>. It is usually expressed in a <ment>PP</ment>-complement or the direct object. <ex>Professor Frink <t>sailed</t> to Italy <fex name="Vehicle">on an oceanliner</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Source
Arg.definition: <def-root>Any expression which implies a definite starting-point of motion expresses the frame element <fen>Source</fen>. <ex>We <t>flew</t> <fex name="Source">from Atlanta</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>The Manner describes a property of the motion not related to its trajectory. <ex>Samantha always <t>rode</t> <fex name="Manner">gracefully</fex> on the back of a motorcycle.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Path
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Path</fen> describes the trajectory of the motion. <ex>The caravan <t>rode</t> <fex name="Path">through the desert</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Goal
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Goal</fen> is the endpoint of the trajectory of motion. <ex>We <t>sailed</t> <fex name="Goal">to Morocco</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Distance
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Distance</fen> is the extent of the motion. <ex>We <t>flew</t> <fex name="Distance">300 miles</fex> in 40 minutes.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition: <def-root>The Duration is the amount of time the motion takes. <ex>We <t>rode</t> in the van <fex name="Duration">for 45 minutes</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Speed
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Speed</fen> is the rate at which the motion occurs. <ex>We <t>flew</t><fex name="Speed"> at nearly 600 miles per hour</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Area
Arg.definition: <def-root>The Area is the location where the motion takes place. <ex>We <t>rode</t> <fex name="Area">around the state</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Road
Arg.definition: <def-root>The Road is the thoroughfare on which the <fen>Vehicle</fen> travels. <ex>We <t>ride</t> the bus <fex name="Road">on highway 580</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Route
Arg.definition: <def-root>The Route is the usual path that the <fen>Vehicle</fen> travles. <ex>I <t>ride</t> <fex name="Route">the London-Birmingham route</fex> almost everyday.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>When the riding takes place. <ex>We will <t>fly</t> back to New York <fex name="Time">in September</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Cotheme
Arg.definition: <def-root>A theme that rides in the same <fen>Vehicle</fen> as the main <fen>Theme</fen>. <ex>My family always <t>flies</t> to New York <fex name="CT">with our good friends, the Jacksons</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Driver
Arg.definition: <def-root>The individual that directs the motion of the <fen>Vehicle</fen></def-root>
